events.message: I received my recent order but want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected and I would like to know how to proceed with returning it.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their inquiry about returning the product and getting their money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Alice to handle the refund process and assist the customer with their return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reason for the refund request to help us proceed efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I am requesting a refund because the product did not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once the item is returned. I will email you a prepaid shipping label to send the product back at no cost.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick response and the prepaid shipping label offer.
We have sent the prepaid label to your email and your refund will be processed after we receive the returned package.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the prepaid label and to check if you need any further assistance with your return.
As we have not heard back and the refund process is underway, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
